description: People weakness identification consists of identifying and analyzing weaknesses and vulnerabilities from the intelligence gathering phases which can be leveraged to gain access to target or intermediate target persons of interest or social trust relationships.
name: OSRS MITRE Pre-ATT&CK Matrix - People Weakness Identification

values.description: Understanding organizational skillsets and deficiencies could provide insight in to weakness in defenses, or opportunities for exploitation.
values.value: OSRS MITRE Pre-ATK People Weakness Identification: T1297 Analyze organizational skillsets and deficiencies

values.description: Social media provides insight into the target's affiliations with groups and organizations. Certification information can explain their technical associations and professional associations. Personal information can provide data for exploitation or even blackmail.
values.value: OSRS MITRE Pre-ATK People Weakness Identification: T1295 Analyze social and business relationships, interests, and affiliations

values.description: An adversary may assess a target's operational security (OPSEC) practices in order to identify targeting options. A target may share different information in different settings or be more of less cautious in different environments.
values.value: OSRS MITRE Pre-ATK People Weakness Identification: T1296 Assess targeting options
